Html:
Hi Kendal,

I had an idea for a feature request. I am getting a false positive performance suggestion that isn't relevant as mount points are being used:

"The Default Data Path is configured for a drive (Z:) that currently holds database files of another type. This may result in multiple file types on the same drive when new databases are created which can negatively impact performance."

Making SQL Power Doc mount point aware would rock!


Can't say thank you enough,

Chuck

Chuck,
I am working on a set of changes to SQL Power Doc and will look into including mountpoint data. Good suggestion!

--Kendal
